trans-unit.source: A base class that represents syndication content.
This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
It is used as the base class for the following syndication content types:
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance to use to initialize the new instance.
Gets the attribute extensions for this content.
Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications.
The syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a syndication content type (for example, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent>).
When serialized to Atom 1.0, these attributes appear within the `<content>` element.
When serialized to RSS 2.0, these attribute are ignored.
A dictionary that contains the attribute extensions for this object.
Creates a copy of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
A copy of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified HTML content.
The string passed into this method should contain HTML.
The text of the content.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified plain text content.
The plain text content.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.UrlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> and media type.
The media type parameter can be set to any known MIME type value as defined in [RFC 2046](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95720).
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> of the content.
The media type of the content.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.UrlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified XHTML content.
The XHTML content.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.TextSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified data contract object.
The data contract object.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates XML syndication content.
An instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> class that contains the new content.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified data contract object and data contract serializer.
The data contract object.
The data contract serializer.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance with the specified object and XML serializer.
The object.
The XML serializer.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.XmlSyndicationContent"></xref> instance.
Gets the syndication content type.
This property is abstract, so it must be accessed on an instance of a syndication content type (a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent>).
The .NET Framework defines the following syndication content types:
This class contains a number of static helper methods for creating the various types of syndication content:
The name of the type of syndication content.
Writes the contents of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
This method only writes the content contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
Writes the contents of this object to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> within the specified element and element namespace.
The content contained in this object is written within the specified outer element.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
